alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 6:13PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Lilburn affecting Gwinnett County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Lilburn. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in portions of the Northwood Country Club Golf Course upstream from the gage on Club Drive...and in the woodland areas downstream from the gage and for the next four miles until the creek merges with the Yellow River. An old concrete golf cart bridge around 300 feet downstream from the gage will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.2 feet and nearly steady. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 PM EDT Tuesday was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The creek will fall below flood stage in the next few hours and continue to fall. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
